Grow Your Family

For managing it all and sharing the load with your family.

An app for families with a lot of moving parts.

A better way to keep track of health, and budgets, and birth certificates, and even the list of names you didn't choose.

For private information about our lives and what really matters.

A better way to make plans, share lists, keep track of health and budgets and where to put year-end grades from pre-school.

Features at a glance

Calendar

For appointments, milestones and the big due date.

Contacts

For doctors, teachers, and the name of that really helpful nurse.

Photos

For photo albums and videos of the moments we never forget.

Notes

For taking note of each trimester and the funny things we learn from parenthood.

Documents

For the health forms, the hospital documents, the paperwork and insurance.

Lists

For what to pack, the carseat, the blankets, the camera and the batteries.

Stories

For Grandma's story about history, family, and love.

Sharing

For sharing with parents, grandparents, and the extended family.

Request an invite for the first comprehensive app designed for your family. Brought to you by Djed, from the heart of Austin, Texas.
